=== Ubuntu 8.10 (Intrepid Ibex) ===

[[Image:Ubuntu 8.10.png|right|thumb|Ubuntu 8.10 RC<br /> (''Intrepid Ibex'')]]
Ubuntu 8.10 (''Intrepid Ibex''), to be released on [[2008-10-30]],<ref name="intrepid_release">{{cite web |url=https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+milestone/ubuntu-8.10|title=Milestone ubuntu-8.10 for Ubuntu due 2008-10-30|accessdate=2008-04-28}}</ref> will be Canonical's ninth release of Ubuntu.<ref name="warty_release" /> It will be supported until April 2010. Ubuntu 8.10 has several planned new features including a new default theme<ref>{{cite web |url=https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-art/2008-January/004855.html | title=Ubuntu theme update postponed | accessdate=2008-03-26}}</ref> (which has since been postponed again){{Fact|date=October 2008}}, improvements to mobile computing and desktop scalability, increased flexibility for Internet connectivity, a [[Graphical User Interface|GUI]] driven [[Live USB]] creator (possibly [[Ubuntu Live USB creator]]), a guest account,<ref>
